taxon_name.authority: Rydberg in N. L. Britton et al.

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family asteraceae;tribe heliantheae;subtribe chaenactidinae;genus hymenothrix;species loomisii

bio:treatment.description: Annuals or biennials, 30–70 cm. Phyllaries 8(–12), mostly linear to narrowly oblanceolate. Rays 0. Disc florets 10–20; corollas creamy to bright yellow, mostly 4–4.5 mm, lobe lengths 0.3–1 times throats; anthers yellowish. Cypselae 2.5–4+ mm; pappus scales 3–5 mm. 2n = 24.
bio:treatment.discussion: Occurrences of Hymenothrix loomisii in California have been geographically scattered, sporadic, and nonpersistent introductions.
